title: BRIEF-Clicks Group Reports FY Diluted HEPS 672 Cents
text:
BRIEF-Clicks Group Reports FY Diluted HEPS 672 Cents

Stock Markets 38 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 09:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Clicks Group Reports FY Diluted HEPS 672 Cents Oct 24 (Reuters) - Clicks Group Ltd : * JSE: CLS - ANNUAL GROUP RESULTS FOR THE YEAR ENDED 31 AUGUST 2019 AND CASH DIVIDEND DECLARATION * CLICKS GROUP LTD - FY DILUTED HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASED BY 16.8% TO 672 CENTS * CLICKS GROUP LTD - FY TOTAL DIVIDEND GREW BY 17.1% TO 445 CENTS PER SHARE * CLICKS GROUP LTD - FY RETAIL HEALTH AND BEAUTY SALES INCREASED BY 10.5% * CLICKS GROUP LTD - FY GROUP TURNOVER INCREASED BY 7.2% TO R31.4 BILLION * CLICKS GROUP LTD - "GROUP HAS ADAPTED WELL TO TRADING IN THIS PROTRACTED ECONOMIC DOWNTURN" * CLICKS GROUP LTD - FY OPERATING MARGIN UP 40 BPS TO 7.4% * CLICKS GROUP LTD - CONFIDENT OF SUSTAINING VOLUME GROWTH IN YEAR AHEAD

BRIEF-Clicks Group Reports FY Diluted HEPS 672 Cents
description: BRIEF-Clicks Group Reports FY Diluted HEPS 672 Cents
